items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Most-Worn Cardigan â€” I Keep Coming Back for More!
items.body: This cardigan has become one of my absolute wardrobe staples. I already have it in three colors and just added the chocolate one to my cart because when I love something, I commit. ðŸ˜‚ Why Itâ€™s a Favorite: â€¢ Lightweight but cozy Itâ€™s that perfect in-between layer â€” not hot, not flimsy. Great for chilly offices, conference rooms, or overly air-conditioned airports. â€¢ Goes with EVERYTHING Jeans? Yep. Dresses? Absolutely. Yoga pants, skirts, basic tees? All of the above. Itâ€™s a boho-meets-classic piece that instantly makes any outfit look intentional and stylish. â€¢ Perfect for travel I travel a lot for work, so space in my suitcase is precious. These cardigans fold up small, donâ€™t wrinkle, and work with every outfit I pack. I pretty much always toss one (or two) into my suitcase. â€¢ Flattering oversized fit For reference, Iâ€™m 5'5", 125 lbs, 36D, and the Small/Medium works perfectly â€” comfy and drapey without swallowing me. Colors Worth Mentioning: The beige is gorgeous with jeans and a white tee. The black honestly works with anything â€” itâ€™s the most versatile. And nowâ€¦ chocolate will be joining the rotation. Bottom Line: If youâ€™re looking for a lightweight, throw-on-with-anything cardigan that travels well and makes you look effortlessly put together, this is the one. I recommend grabbing at least one colorâ€¦ but youâ€™ll probably come back for more. Read more

items.body: Cute and lightweight. Good value Read more
items.author: Hedy Eaddy

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice summer sweater but runs large
items.body: Very nice lightweight crochet summer sweater cardigan. I liked this sweater. I wear it with my short sleeve summer dresses. Its cute. I only have 1 complaint. It easiky stretches out of shape particularly the sleeves. If I pushed them up my arm they stretch out and then fall to passed my wrists and won't stay up if I push them up my arm again. Its annoying. Otherwise. I really like it. If I buy another one and I might in a different color, I think I will go with a smaller size. I think it runs large. Read more
items.author: Tammy Isakson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute on and looks expenseive
items.body: This sweater is so cute. Itâ€™s thin and perfect for spring. I am 5â€™7â€, 140 lbs. I ordered the small because I didnâ€™t want it to feel too baggy and the arms are great and I love the fit. I just wish it was a little bit longer to go a little bit beneath my short jean shorts, but thatâ€™s my fault for ordering a small. Also, the color is a little bit lighter than the picture. Iâ€™m going to return this one and I ordered the medium in the khaki so hopefully itâ€™ll be a tiny bit darker than off-white but definitely recommend super cute and a great price. You can wear this with shorts or with a dress. It definitely does not look cheap. Also, when I just went to order a bigger size theyâ€™re having a flash sale so stock up in a few colors for summer!!! Iâ€™m going to LA and this is going to be my go to sweater for cooler evenings no matter what outfit Iâ€™m wearing. Read more
items.author: Alligator74

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty, BUTâ€¦
items.body: Itâ€™s very prettyâ€¦ BUT: 1.) Size guide is off by about ten inches so if you want oversized, size up (this is based off how it fits but I did include a flat-lay with tape measure across it). 2.) Not necessarily â€œstretchyâ€ but rather a thread that will relax over wear time. 3.) It took FOREVER to arrive and did not arrive in the window Amazon said it would. Tried to cancel it but they shipped it the next day. Despite these things, Seams appeared to be quality and the garment looks like it would launder well in a garment bag (itâ€™s a delicate piece). I could see it being a nice piece for me (if it were the right size). I donâ€™t have great success with Amazon and returns lately so Iâ€™m going to gift it to my niece. I would not say the value for money was worth it given all the above. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE it!
items.body: I bought the cream colored one in large. I am 5' 5", 170 lbs. It fits perfect and and still roomy and flows. Its super soft and comfy, lightweight. You can dress it up and go casual with it. It won't be warm for winter, you would need to wear it under a coat. I haven't washed it yet, but when I do it will be on cold and gentle cycle and hang dry. I never put anything but my under garments in the dryer and clothes will last years that way. I want to get more in different colors! Price is good too!! Read more
items.author: Hellooooooo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars CUTE
items.body: fits perfect!! i got a Large. very cute for fall. itâ€™s not warm so if youâ€™re looking for warmth i wouldnâ€™t get this one!! Read more
items.author: Gabrielle Johnson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty versatile cardigan
items.body: I couldn't love these cardigans more! They come in a great variety of colors. They are lightweight enough to wear in the spring and even in summer but provide enough coverage to be warm on a chilly day. The material is soft and not itchy at all. The only downfall is because they are crocheted they snag easily. I have found you can pull the threads back through fairly easy so that is not a deal-breaker for me. These cardigans are versatile enough to be worn over t-shirts with jeans or denim shorts. They can also be worn over a nicer blouse with dress pants or over a dress. I own these in several colors and will likely order more. I will however watch for a good deal as they are a little bit pricey. Read more
items.author: LS

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Tan, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Camel, Coffee, Orange, Beige, Light Purple, Grey, Sky Blue, Blue, Burgundy, Light Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
